ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] New Player
ygData.msgSnippet: Where are you hunting? If you re in Gfay area I can probably help you out sometime. A cool thing to do is collect crushbone belts and turn them in. You get
ygData.messageBody:
Where are you hunting?
If you're in Gfay area I can probably help you out sometime. A cool thing to
do is collect crushbone belts and turn them in. You get some patchwork armor
that you can wear. It's cruddy, but it's a start.
Basically kill critters til you get armor. When you start hunting higher
level mobs they start dropping more coin.
Most of my characters are on the Tribunal.
You can contact Elzeria, Damita, and Tiladanu (I know I'm missing some but
can't remember their names right now).
What class and race? In a guild yet?
luv,
-Su

> Hello All
>
> I know I'm about 20 years late, but I'm making that transition from
> Ultima Online and MUD to EQ. I've been enjoying it so far on the
> Tribunal Server. THINGS ARE EXPENSIVE! Leveling is pretty balance.
> Plenty of helpful players!
>
> I'm just looking for advice on how to get more money. A player gave
> me a sweet sword does high damage, but other than that I'm naked.
>
> Thanks
> DLG
>
